name: Extreme Bike Simulator
description:
Extreme Bike Simulator

Extreme Bike Simulator is a fun and exciting open world Motorbike driving simulator where you control a super fast police motorbike.

Enjoy fast sports bike racing and riding by performing stunts and completing sports bike level challenges with most realistic super bike simulator .

Racing the best in bike action games. Complete previous level to get into next level, every next level is much more challenging and strategic demanding than the previous one. Strap on your helmet, ride super bike with style and burn the track with throttle when bike is in extreme speed.

Choose from a wide selection of police motorbikes and drive wherever you want in the city paradise. Experience the biggest, fastest drifts, and gain top speeds to execute difficult stunts like the loop de loop!

Key Features :

=> Easy to learn Bike controls, both touch and tilt controls 
=> Realistic police motorbike physics
=> Massive real life city map environments with traffic => Nitrous/Nitro Button for extra bike speed
=> Real world environments with city area
=> Addictive Item collection in game
